comment: I took her over the summer. Very good professor. Attendance is not mandatory, but I would recommend it, as she did give a lot of extra credit. Studying will help a lot for the tests. There were only 4 tests (which were monitored but many quizzes and homework to help with your grade.

Mrs. Smith seemed to truly care for each student that showed up to class. She went out of her way to solve an issue for me during the semester, and provided clear lectures and studying material for tests. Overall a great professor and someone you want to have for accounting.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Smith is super clear, funny, and helpful. Took her in summer, totally worth it. She gives extra credit, stays after class to help, and makes everything easy to understand. Her teaching style is smooth and engaging. Definitely one of the best professors I've had!

I took professor smith online for a summer course and it was not too bad. The material was obviously faster but it was really doable. All her tests are lockdown browser with someone also monitoring you. She does a good amount of extra credit make sure to DO IT because it can really help your grade and it is not hard at all.

Professor Smith was a great teacher. Accounting is a subject that is either you get it or you don't. She was so nice and accommodating. I met with her throughout the semester because I was just not getting the material. The whole department makes you have a live proctor looking at you as well as the browser is being monitored as well.

Professor Smith was kind, but I felt she was too inconsistent with grading. She got three questions wrong on an exam, and even after multiple emails and an office visit, the corrections weren't made before final grades. She also failed me on the final, then admitted one question was wrongly marked, but still never fixed the grade.

Intermediate financial accounting is a hard course general but Professor Smith really cares about her students and is willing to help in any way possible. I had a C average across all 4 exams but because of all the extra course work and projects I was able to finish the class with a B. Final exam was cumulative. I recommend going to class.

ACCT2102 is NOT an easy COURSE specially with MONITOR EDU.  Use available resources (GTA sessions, Learning Center and Kack Tutoring). Prof Smith is Great. On-Hands lectures, Knowledgeable and Super Caring; Exams 50%online 50%in person. Attendance NOT mandatory but if you missed, you only hurting yourself. Funny, Energetic and Fair Grader!

Don't be fooled by the good reviews. I spent countless hours studying and still failed every tests. The lecture videos were from 2022 and 2023. Weekly announcements were posted late or never posted. I sent multiple emails and most went completely unanswered. She told students that exams multiple-choice and the exams were not like the materials.
She provides lots of extra credit. If you study you will pass.

She's a great professor who's incredibly passionate about accounting and well-established in the School of Accountancy. Her point grading system makes it almost impossible to fail, and she offers lots of exam support. Exams are in person (no MonitorEDU). Just note: her teaching style isn't for everyone, but you'll learn a lot.
She was amazing, willing to walk you through every little detail of Int Financial Accounting and explain the why. Really wants all her students to pass.
lectures are super quick paced she just shows answers on the screen barely explains. no step by step type notes.

If you don't take Professor Smith what are you doing? She gives amazing lectures and literally prints notes for students so you can "play" along. She wants every student to succeed. Don't be hesitant to ask questions and make sure to look over the study guide before exams and the foundational 15.

She cares about the content and her students. This class is assignment heavy but she provides plenty of extra credit opportunities so it's almost impossible to fail. Even if this isn't a mandatory class for you, you'll still walk away with basic knowledge of accounting. Need more professors like her honestly.

This course is hard and not lay off class but with Ms. Smith she will make sure you have enough extra credit to pass her class.  Unlimited attempts on HW and 2 chances on quizzes. In-class extra credit assessment so be cautious about that and she very visual learner so please attend class if you are one or you want a class that gives extra credit.
Prof. Smith is passionate about the subject and genuinely cares about her students. A good bit of work outside of class, but gives extra credit. Just do all the work and you'll get an A.
she's a lovely lady and gives a lot of extra credit but omg the most boring class i've ever taken. failed all the exams and still made a B in the course. do the extra credit and you'll be fine.

She is a great professor and an even better person. She cares for you and your success in the class so much. Accounting is a hard class but Prof Smith offers so much extra credit to help boost your grade. The homework assignments are great practices for the test. She is the best professor I have had at KSU. Take her!

10/10 She teaches the content very well Attendance is not mandatory but I recommend going to the lectures because accounting is not a course you can just miss Sometimes she uploads videos of each module to further help with studying 4 Exams 2-3 chapters each are Live proctored with screen and video recording on a laptop Does exam review.

Truly cares about her students successes. Let us retake 3/4 of the exams. Curved the fourth exam in order for her students to do well. She is so kind and wants the best for her students. I would definitely take her again!
Very patient and nice.

The best professor I've had at KSU. It's very clear she cares about her students and their well being. Her lectures are very helpful and easy to follow. I have yet to miss a class because she teaches the concepts so well. She goes over everything in class that is on the exams. She made a very hard tedious class very easy to follow and do well in.

Such an awesome professor. I took the class with this professor and got a 78 the first time because I never went to class. I took it again because i needed a B and I she really took time to help me get a higher grade. She is great at answering questions. She makes a difficult class easy for sure.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: She is possibly my favorite accounting professor. Her lectures are fun and why she won't just give you an A she sets you up to succeed so long as you study and put the work in. She makes sure you understand the concepts and will help you after class if you need it. GREAT PROFESSOR!!!!
Took her summer course in person and there was no challenge at all. If you pay attention and do all of the work you can get an easy A.

Took this during summer. Amazing professor, really funny and sweet. Easier than ACCT 2101, class was a bunch of formulas and simple calculations. Homework unlimited attempts. In class handouts match the homework. Exams really easy, don't need to do any crazy studying. Tons of extra credit. Didn't do the case studies or final and still got an A.

The only reason I got an A- is because I had enough points to take zeros for every part of the last unit and FOR THE FINAL EXAM. If that doesn't tell you that it is a good class idk what will. cares about students and is always willing to help. Sit in front row and pay attention. Great class with a great professor!! extra credit all the time!!

Professor Jennifer will probably be one of your favorite professors if you can communicate with her about things you're not able to comprehend. She gives out extra credit for attendance on certain occasions. She will indeed try to help you pass the class so that you won't struggle!

This class is much easier than Accounting 1. Prof Smith's lectures can be boring and hard to focus on but using Connect I was able to learn what was going on. She gave a bunch of extra credit this semester and I had enough points for an A without taking the final. Highly suggest taking her.

Professor Smith wants you to succeed. I struggled a lot with Accounting and didn't do great on the first exams but she gives as much partial credit as possible and tons of extra credit. If you do all the assignments and study the practice problems you should have no problem. She explains everything well and makes a seemingly impossible class easy.

Just took this for my first accounting class, this professor is helpful. Her lectures are good, but boring (but this IS an accounting class so can't be helped) she is nice and welcomes people to seek help if they are struggling with the class. Assigned reviews before tests which are super helpful, STUDY THEM! Bonus point assignments are frequent
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: Professor Smith gives so many in class resources that are almost exactly what will be on the tests and works through problems without it being lectured. Participation grade and unlimited attempts on hw and quizzes so easy 100%. 4 non cumulative tests on paper but so much partial credit given its worth it. Best professor I've ever had at Kennesaw!!

This class was very easy both in terms of workload and difficulty of assignments. Mrs. Smith also offers LOTS of extra credit (probably enough, if all is completed, to bump your grade up a whole letter!) that is stupidly easy to complete. It is very hard to not get an A in the class with the amount of extra credit she gives. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!

As long as you stay on top of your work you'll do great. She offers many ways for extra credit and is good at teaching the material. There is a lot of graded practice for each chapter but it only helps you and isn't excessive, definitely take her!

Professor Smith is by far my favorite professor I have had in my college career. I had absolutely no trouble understanding the material for Accounting 2. This is coming from someone who barely passed Accounting 1 with a C. Professor Smith provides an abundant amount of extra credit, so it is very possible to achieve over 100% in her class.
In person test rest of accounting 2 classes r not in person do not take her class

Very easy class specifically online, and she broke down the work fairly well. Smartbook was used, which i find much easier in general. Work is a little heavy but if you stay on top of it you should be able to leave the class with an A. Don't wait to do your master budget project!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Smith is a great teacher and I recommend you take her! She truly cares about your success and gives you plenty of opportunities to succeed.
She's a bit of a clunky typer in excel but other than that she's really good. Actually teaches the material, gives lots of examples, and explains everything step by step. Would take again.

This woman is a saint and is so good at her job. Dr. Smith is truly one of the best Accounting professors that I have ever had. Her patience and ability to explain the material makes her class enjoyable.

Overall a great professor for this course. This course is not an easy A, but you will make one if you work for it. Dr. Smith offers generous extra credit opportunities which make that possible. Lectures are also worth attending. She explains the concepts well and gives out helpful practice problems.

The BEST professor for Accounting 2102, Dr. Smith is so helpful and wants everyone in her class to succeed. SHe's the sweetest lady ever and I wish I could take her again. The class itself is very difficult but if you take the time to study using the extra practice questions you can get the A!

It is her terrible teaching style which made me do less in this course. I ended up hating accounting because of what I experienced in her class. I was sick for about two weeks during her class and provided her with documentation but did not show any desire to accommodate my situation and instead gave me a lower grade. I am very disappointed.

If you take her show up to class, take good notes, and make sure to study. I messed up towards the end of the semester and I ended up failing by 2 points. She doesn't help curve anything. She didn't pass me even tho I was ONLY 2 points away. She's great at teaching but just know she doesn't curve, so be on top of schoolwork!

I'm really bad at accounting but Prof Smith made it an enjoyable experience and genuinely cares about your success. Pretty much just like ACCT 2101 with MCHill, excel project, and lockdown tests, but Prof Smith definitely made 2102 much more manageable, and would take her again for another accounting class!

She is the best professor I've ever had. She actually teaches the material, and gives full explanations of how to do the work. It's rare to find a teacher like Professor Smith. I highly suggest you register for her classes as soon as it's available.

Professor Smith is passionate about accounting and makes the material easy to comprehend. She is glad to answer any questions and works with you to improve your understanding. She genuinely cares about students and wants them to succeed.

Professor Smith was a very fair professor. She responded to emails within a day and was also very accessible out of class. She made her lectures very digestible and easy to understand. The homework is all on Mcgraw-Hill and she gave lots of extra credit that equaled about 10% of your total grade. I HIGHLY recommend taking her if you can.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: If you can take this Professor! You will not regret it. She is very helpful and gives extra credit. There is one project on excel it's not bad at all. She even allowed us to have a day in class to complete it if we needed her help. She teaches in a way that makes accounting easier to understand and does not mind going over something twice TAKE HER

Jennifer Smith is such a kind heart and great professor. She gives lots of extra credit and is always wiling to help if you need it. All you have do is show up and learn the class is super easy and well structured. 4 Tests including exams. A Smartbook quiz and homework for each chapter with a few projects. Easy A if you participate and do your work

Loved professor smith! She was a sweet professor that taught accounting well! She gave so many opportunities for extra credit that it was easy to succeed. The homework and quizzes were easy to do well on, but the majority of our grade were points from tests and the final exam. Would take again!
Incredible professor, made accounting manageable and she really wants you to succeed. I enjoyed her humor, her willingness to help you, and her organization. Take her!

Very easy acct class. Hw and quizzes were open notes and open for you to work at your own pace. The 2 exams were a little hard but doable got an 80 on both. Excel project is much easier than acct 2101. Writing assignment was very easy not a hard grader.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Test heavy

comment: One of my favorite professors! She really cares about her students. Accounting is a tough course but if you put in the effort, an A is achievable. Quizzes and homework are on connect and exams are proctored. Extra credit is offered. I did way better in this class than I did in 2101. I definitely recommend Professor Smith!

One of my favorite professors so far!  I enjoyed her class, and she explains concepts thoroughly and makes sure you understand.  Accounting is not easy - attend her office hours, participate, and ask questions!  She is more than willing to help.  It was a pleasure - I will definitely go out of my way to ensure that I take her in a future class.

Do not recommend. Maybe she's better in person but her online teaching is terrible. Hw, quizzes and proctored exams are on McGraw connect. I don't consider this as her teaching when it's just a system that does it. Expect a lot of reading, a project and an ethics essay.The test are hard and her practice exams were over 50 pages long. SMH
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: Best accounting professor at KSU! She has an amazing personality and incredible teaching style. I love how much she makes sure that everyone understands the material. I did better in this class than I did in 2101, she was that great! Very highly recommend, especially if you have a harder time understanding the concepts of accounting.

Excellent professor very understanding and genuinely wants to see the  students succeed in Accounting 2102. She goes over the material very thoroughly, and her review sessions are incredibly beneficial. Overall great teacher would recommend taking Dr.Smith!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Amazing lectures

comment: Take Dr.Smith, if you can because she gives out 82 points of extra credit within connect and going to class. She made Accounting 2102 easy instead making it difficult. I made a 100 in accounting 2102 as my final grade. I recommend Dr.Smith for Accounting 2102!

Professor Smith is so sweet and caring, she has a great sense of humor and knows how to deliver lectures. The workload was easy going but make sure you grasp each concept. She provides everything you need and provides opportunities for extra credit. Amazing lady.

Best professor I have ever taken. She is kind, caring, and always willing to help. She offers help to whoever needs it, and the extra credit can help your grade. The tests are more manageable than the first accounting and are also done on a lockdown browser. Take her if you are given the opportunity, and you will thank me!

If you want any A in Accounting, I recommend Dr. Smith!! She gives out extra credit throughout the semester which each extra credit is worth 4.5 points to your overall average. The tests are a lot easier in Accounting 2102 then they are in Accounting 2101!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: This class is not assignment heavy. I went to class less than the number of fingers I have and I am satisfied with my grade. She gives a few opportunities for extra credit too. Hard to fail

Prof. Smith is super personable and always willing to help. She explains the material in a way that it sticks and she doesn't have a problem slowing down or going over something twice. She offers tons of extra credit and as long as you do your work, there is no way you should get anything below a B.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Smith is a fantastic professor. Just make sure you attend class because the way she teaches really helps students to better understand the content. She is very caring and offers extra credit. Grades are based on 3 tests, including the final exam, homework, packback questions, and one ethics paper.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She's the best teacher I ever had by far. Very caring of her students and goes above and beyond to help you understand the subject. She gives lots of extra credit and you will get anything lower than A if you do not do your HW, Quizzes and SB... which is why I got B.

She was the best account professor I have taken so far! Very understanding of issues outside of school. She gives a lot of extra credit and will explain things in depth if you need help. She is also very accessible via email. 10/10 recommend.
Take this professor, you won't regret your decision!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: I cannot imagine a better professor for accounting 2. There is loads of extra credit so if you are not good at test taking you can still make an A. You do not have to go to class, but you may miss out on extra credit if you skip.

Professor Smith is really good at explaining concepts of accounting. She gives tons of extra credit that I think everyone should do. You are not required to go to class, but it helps a lot if you do :D.

I was so nervous to take my first accounting class but she was THE best! She explains everything so well and makes it easy to understand. She gives plenty of extra bonus assignments so I would do all of them! Her exam reviews are so similar to the test which helped TREMENDOUSLY! Amazing Professor!
Explains topics really well. Made accounting make sense. Take if she's available. Super caring + nice.

I am a Junior (about to be a Senior) and she has been in the top 3 best Professors I have ever had. She cuts through the unnecessary material to focus on what should be taught and makes sure you understand everything before moving on. She is really nice and responsive. She will help you through anything you are struggling on.

One of the best professors at KSU. She goes through examples every class which is a must for an accounting class. Also gives out lots of extra credit for those who show up to class. Very kind and sweet lady who you won't regret taking.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She told us not to worry about grades because she was going to help us pass and that all that mattered to her is that we actually learn something. I think that says it all. Needless to say, I got a 99 in the class and that's given my lack of interest in the subject matter. She is a very caring and knowledge focused professor.

I took her 2100 class and it is a somewhat challenging subject, but Prof. Smith does a great job and walking everyone through the steps and giving great examples. She also posts the notes online for practice, as well as curves the tests. Taking her should be an easy A if you are willing to go to class and put in some effort.

Gives you every opportunity to do well. So much extra credit to help you out. It's a difficult course, but Mrs. Smith makes it easy to understand. All homework assignments are online as well as most quizzes and tests. Allows use of notes on all quizzes, tests, exams. Actually cares about your understanding of the class and grade.

I loved professor Smith! She was one of the best professors I have ever had! Accounting is hard but she will take the extra time to make sure you understand everything. She is so kind and so sweet! I would defiantly retake her class if I could!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Lecture heavy

comment: Mrs. Smith is a great accounting professor. She really cares about the subject and she wants you to pass the class and really understand the material. The tests are hard but she gives opportunities to get some points back with corrections. I really enjoyed this class with her.

This is her first semester at KSU. I really like her and would take her again if she stays here and teaches upper level classes. Its hard to make accounting lectures interesting but she really tries to engage the class and does a lot of examples in class. Acct majors: TAKE HER, YOU WONT REGRET IT :)
